body_text: Hi Kashish Bhatia,  Do you need subtitles here? If yes, then the 2nd video has one line in the beginning which needs to be removed.
body:
Hi Kashish Bhatia,

Do you need subtitles here? If yes, then the 2nd video has one line in the beginning which needs to be removed.
for copy.
